content:
Hello. I have two summer students who will work with me on formalizing some mathematics in Lean. Essentially this is a summer project in research infrastructure rather than in research. If this is successful I will think about doing this on a more regular basis.
Q1: which tutorials are recommended for students?
Q2: I will discuss the mathematics to be encoded based on what the students know and what is of interest/use to me -- but is there a way to solicit suggestions from the community?
Thanks, Lior (UBC)

(if this is the wrong part of the forum for this let me know)
Natural number game to start them off, then Mathematics In Lean
